name: county
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a political division of the UK or Ireland, forming the largest unit of local government, or the largest political division of a state in the US: County Antrim A county usually consists of several towns and the rural areas that surround them. Rutland is the smallest county in England. Texas is divided into 254 counties.
More examplesFewer examplesBinns was a dab hand at cricket and played for his county in his youth.Our school won the county football shield this year.The county Board of Education has decided to cancel high school gymnastics and golf programs.Bounded on the east by Lake Winnebago, the county is traversed by the Wolf and Fox rivers.Judge Davis upheld the county court's decision.
